comments.raw_text:
https://github.com/davedash/mysql-anonymous looks at a .yml file to figure out what it needs to scrub from a database.  I expect the config file will get out of date as the database evolves, meaning new data may slip through.

We should make any table not mentioned in the .yml be truncated automatically.  If a developer needs it, they'll add it to the .yml manually and it'll get a review then.
comments.creator: wclouser@mozilla.com
comments.text:

We should make any table not mentioned in the .yml be truncated automatically.  If a developer needs it, they'll add it to the .yml manually and it'll get a review then.
